${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:ConstrictEnemies.NAME: Pollution
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply 4 #ytheconstrictor:Constricting to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Rockfish.NAME: Rockfish
${modID}:Rockfish.FLAVOR: The Hardest and strongest of all fish. Nom nom nom.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength and #b1 #yDexterity.

${modID}:StrangeRing.NAME: Strange Ring
${modID}:StrangeRing.FLAVOR: Very hard to eat and tasteless. 0/10.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, gain #b6 #ytheconstrictor:Constricting.

${modID}:SlimyShield.NAME: Slimy Shield
${modID}:SlimyShield.FLAVOR: Proof of victory in a hard fought battle.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, lose #b6 #ytheconstrictor:Constricting.

${modID}:MarineBiologist.NAME: Marine Biologist
${modID}:MarineBiologist.FLAVOR: Eyes the color of the ocean. They reminds me of home.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #ytheconstrictor:Blur.

${modID}:LilFriend.NAME: Lil Friend
${modID}:LilFriend.FLAVOR: Maybe I judged you too harshly. Tag along if you wish.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add #b3 #yLil #yHits into your hand.

${modID}:SmudgedStone.NAME: Smudged Stone
${modID}:SmudgedStone.FLAVOR: Hard to eat, not that pretty. What's the point?

${modID}:PolishedRelic.NAME: Polished Relic
${modID}:PolishedRelic.FLAVOR: Well cared for by The Collector.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the first #b3 turns of combat, draw #b1 additional card and heal #b3 HP.

${modID}:DustyRelic.NAME: Dusty Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw #b1 additional card and heal #b3 HP.

${modID}:BorrowedSkull.NAME: Borrowed Skull
${modID}:BorrowedSkull.FLAVOR: Extra lethal constricting to deal with those pesky enemies.
DESCRIPTIONS: #ytheconstrictor:Constricting now affects enemies at the start of their turn rather than at the end of it.
